CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 3, 1945, pg. 3 reads: "First Anniversary Celebration - the Pittsburgh Interracial Action Council celebrated its first anniversary, at ....Henry, with an elaborate banquet, Monday evening.  Over 200 guests attended the celebration...Miss Connie Scott, who was chairman of the committee which conducted the successful campaign against discriminatory policies in restaurants, is on the right.Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Connie Scott wearing dark dress with light colored stitching and hat with veil, speaking into microphone at banquet table, in interior with egg and dart moldings, for the Pittsburgh Interracial Action Council anniversary celebration
